name: Citizen
desc: An ordinary commoner.

name: Myrmidon
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Swordmaster
desc: Devotees of the sword. Possess incredible speed and skill.

name: Mercenary
desc: Professional soldiers for hire. Well-balanced, with superior abilities all around.

name: Vanguard
desc: Veteran warriors expert in all fields of combat.

name: Thief
desc: Expert in stealth and subterfuge. Possess weak attacks but many other skills.

name: Assassin
desc: Killers at home in the shadows.

name: Soldier
desc: Well-rounded combatants who rely on their exceptional skill.

name: Halberdier
desc: Veteran frontliners with inerring accuracy.

name: Cavalier
desc: Mounted knights with superior movement.

name: Paladin
desc: Veteran horse knights.

name: Knight
desc: Heavily armored knights with superior defense but poor movement.

name: General
desc: Defensive stalwarts able to take a hit.

name: Skirmisher
desc: Swift-moving, lightly-armored soldiers of fortune.

name: Dragoon
desc: Devotees of the lance. Fast-moving vanguards that excel behind enemy lines.

name: Fighter
desc: Axe-wielding powerhouses.

name: Warrior
desc: Determined fighters who relish battle.

name: Archer
desc: Lightly armored soldiers armed with bows. Can attack from a distance.

name: Sniper
desc: Devotees of the bow. Possess incredible range.

name: Tactician
desc: Scholars trained to lead.

name: Strategist
desc: Scholars who've dedicated their lives to the study of warfare.

name: Cleric
desc: Kind-hearted healers.

name: Oracle
desc: Mages gifted with visions of the future.

name: Mage
desc: Curious practioners of anima magic.

name: Sage
desc: Advanced wielders of the natural magics.

name: Shaman
desc: Impulsive mages with a tenous grasp on their magic.

name: Warlock
desc: War shaman capable of incredible feats of magic.

name: Raider
desc: Untrained but fanatical combatant.

name: Berserker
desc: Devotees of the axe. Relentless savages that deliver devastating stikes.

name: Dracoknight
desc: An elite warrior mounted on the back of a wyvern.

name: Dracolord
desc: Lords who command the battlefield on their draconic mounts.

name: Brigand
desc: Ruffians with a strong offense but poor defense.

name: Sentinel
desc: Armored bruisers who work well on a team.

name: Ballista
desc: Long-range immobile siege weapons.

name: Duke
desc: One of the twelve Imperial Dukes, demons of combat.

name: Wagon
desc: A merchant's wagon.
